name: Delta Test Site
description:
DESCRIPTION
Unit QWERTY 123456 is assembled in Delta Test Site in order to perform several tests.
However, the tests hide more than just data collecting.

CONTROLS:

Arrows: Move

Z: Shoot (When available)

X: Jump (When available)

1: Normal Mode

2: Jump Mode (When available) - (1 energy point per jump)

3: Shoot Mode (When available) - (2 energy points per shoot)

4: Shield Mode (When available) - (5 energy points per damage taken)

Even if a mode is available it wont be possible to change into it if there is not enough energy to perform its action

Version History:

1.0 - 2019/10/06 - Ludum Dare 45 release

1.0.1 - 2019/10/06 - Reduced sfx volume
